title: Breaking Free: How to be Completely Free from any Addiction
description: Are you or someone you love stuck in addiction? Are you tired of simple solutions that just lead to frustration? This book is written by someone who has gone through the hard process of overcoming addiction and recorded his steps along the way. Breaking Free will look at what doesn't work and focus in on what does. Each person is different. Some people can will themselves out of addiction; some need a perspective change; some need relationships that care about them. Whatever the need, Breaking Free covers the importance of each step. More importantly, Breaking Free looks at the roots that allowed addiction to spring up and how to eradicate those roots so it never comes back. Freedom is available; let's find out how to apply it.
author: Kevin W. Shorter
